mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oss_object(name, bucket_id, ext, etag, size, is_folder, create_time, last_update_time, parent,object_acl) VALUE(#{name},#{bucketId},#{ext},#{md5},#{size},#{isFolder},#{createTime},#{lastUpdateTime}, #{parent},#{objectAcl}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=#{name},bucket_id=#{bucketId},ext=#{ext},etag=#{etag}, size=#{size},is_folder=#{isFolder},create_time=#{createTime},last_update_time=#{lastUpdateTime},parent=#{parent},object_acl=#{objectAcl}
